‚ú® Story: 
You face the mighty Slime King Jellothor. 
Stats: 
- Hero HP = 100 
- Monster attack = 18 
- Monster critical = attack ** 2 
- Healer Cat restores 10 HP 
- Treasure chest = 47 coins shared among 3 allies 

Your mission: perform full battle math to survive and count your loot.

The healer gives you soup. HP left: -232 
Each hero gets 11 coins.

content.solution:
hero_hp = 100 
monster_attack = 18 
 
# Normal attack 
hero_hp -= monster_attack 
print("The Slime King squishes you! HP left:", hero_hp) 
 
# Critical hit 
critical = monster_attack ** 2 
hero_hp -= critical 
print("CRITICAL SLIME SPLASH! HP left:", hero_hp) 
 
# Heal 
hero_hp += 10 
print("The healer gives you soup. HP left:", hero_hp) 
 
# Loot 
coins = 47 
allies = 4 
print("Each hero gets", coins // allies, "coins.") 
print("Leftover coins:", coins % allies)

So far, heroes master all Python operators ‚Äî +, -, *, /, //, %, and **.
